General.Name: Cybrid Technologies Inc
General.Description: Cybrid Technologies Inc. manufactures and sells thin film functional polymer materials in China. Its products include vehicle and electric, semiconductor, and E&E heat-conductive insulating material and FPC; reducing tape, product description, protective film, and black shading PET double-sided tape; double side PE foam high temperature sealing, positioning, substrate-free, ultrathin single sided polyester film, exhaust PET double sided, transparent, high bond foam tapes, and bonding film. The company also offers single and double glass module, black module, light weight module, flexibl module, and MoPro solutions. Cybrid Technologies Inc. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
